By the King. A proclamation. Containing his Majesties gracious pardon and indemnity Proclamations. 1679-07-27 Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most Sacred Majesty, Edinburgh : anno Dom. 1679.
Dated at end: Given at Our court, at Windsor Castle, the twenty seventh day of July, one thousand six hundred seventy and nine. Arms 232; Steele notation: Defender All thretti-. Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
=======
